## Type of Suggestion
- [ ] Clearer explanation needed
- [ ] Missing concept or pattern
- [ ] Better example needed
- [ ] New element or sub-element
- [ ] Structural improvement
- [ ] Other

## Which Element?
- [ ] Element 1: Context
- [ ] Element 2: Memory

- [ ] Element 10: Learning

## Description
What would you like to see added or improved?

## Why This Matters
How would this help readers understand agentic systems better?
